name: Red Lentils
properties: Quick cooking compared to other legumes
Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of legumes daily
benefits: Excellent source of protein, vitamins, minerals, fiber and antioxidants. Benefits excess body weight, insulin resistance, high cholesterol, inflammation, and oxidative stress. Part of heart disease prevention.
amount: Part of 3 servings of legumes daily

quotes: THREE-BEAN SOUP WITH TURMERIC AND LENTILS - Turmeric casts a gorgeous golden glow on this hearty soup featuring lentils and three kinds of beans.
1 cup/200g dried red lentils, picked over and rinsed
